Title: By the Numbers
Plot: Peter and Jared represent a brilliant actuary who buys a dying woman?s life insurance policy for pennies on the dollar and then is accused of her murder. Damien and Infeld work with a Venice Beach beekeeper, and Peter makes headway with Charlie, but is surprised to learn she has a daughter.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Nicky Whelan, Martin Starr, Hillary Tuck, Kim Shaw, Jennifer Aspen, Harrison Page, Geoffrey Blake, Nora Dunn, Paul Perri, Courtney Gains, Meg Cionni, David Labiosa
